text: Melinda Kathleen Romero Donnelly (born October 8, 1971) is a Puerto Rican politician for the New Progressive Party (PNP) who has been the United States Shadow Senator from Puerto Rico. She is the youngest daughter of former Governor of Puerto Rico Carlos Romero Barcel√≥ and Kate de Romero. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from San Juan, Puerto Rico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Shadow senators from Puerto Rico
title: Melinda Romero Donnelly
